explains: adj. 无限制的；无限量的；无条件的

sentences.en: You will be allowed unlimited access to the files.
sentences.cn: 你可以无限制使用这些档案。

sentences.en: You'll also have unlimited access to the swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 你将还可以无限制地进入该游泳池。

sentences.en: An unlimited number of copies can still be made from the original.
sentences.cn: 无限量的复制品依然能从原物制作出来。
